name: SearchTagsByName
description:
Search for tags on a list by name.

Use this tool to find specific tags by name within a Mailchimp list. If no name is provided, it will return all tags on the list.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a Mailchimp list. This is essential for specifying which list to search for tags.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

parameters.name: tag_name_search_query
parameters.description: The prefix to filter tags by name. Returns tags where names start with this query.

value_schema.description: The search query used to filter tags.  The search query will be compared to each tag as a prefix, so all tags that have a name starting with this field will be returned.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The search query used to filter tags.  The search query will be compared to each tag as a prefix, so all tags that have a name starting with this field will be returned.

value_schema.description: The search query used to filter tags.  The search query will be compared to each tag as a prefix, so all tags that have a name starting with this field will be returned.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the list.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
